price: (76) He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them.[945] And to Allāh will be returned [all] matters.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamu mā bayna aydīhim wamā khalfahum wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
